thread.title: BuildCoin Foundation Appoints Management Council Members

author: cnbc.com
title: BuildCoin Foundation Appoints Management Council Members

organizations.name: buildcoin foundation appoints management council members zug

text:
ZUG, Switzerland, March 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The BuildCoin™ Foundation a non-profit blockchain ecosystem for public infrastructure and construction projects, is pleased to announce the members of the management council, John C. Cronin III , president and CEO of OpCenter , Inc. in Washington, D.C., Dr. Marcel Dietrich , Chairman of Schweizer Reisekasse (Reka) and owner of MDP Advice GmbH in Wettingen, Switzerland, and Patrick Storchenegger, a board member of the Ethereum Foundation and owner of PST Legal & Consulting in Zug, Switzerland. It is the Management Council's responsibility to provide guidance and oversight in the direction and operation of the BuildCoin Foundation.
"The BuildCoin Foundation is on a journey to build a better world one block at a time," said John Cronin, president, BuildCoin Foundation. "I am excited along with my colleagues on the management council to deliver on this promise, and why we believe the future of infrastructure development is a key to lasting economic and social development for the people living in developed and emerging nations."
"I am pleased to be part of such a promising initiative which aims at improving people's life," said Dr. Marcel Dietrich, vice president, BuildCoin Foundation. "And it is a pleasure to work with professionals that bring a wealth of experience and expertise in their fields."
The Foundation's BuildCoin solution is a blockchain collaborative ecosystem that streamlines business processes, establishes transparency, improves trust and accountability, and unlike traditional industry business practices tracks and transfers value without third-party mediation.
Recently the Foundation announced that the State of Sao Paulo, Brazil signed an infrastructure agreement with GC/LA on behalf of the BuildCoin Foundation.
About the BuildCoin Foundation:
The BuildCoin Foundation is a non-profit blockchain ecosystem for public infrastructure and construction projects based in Zug, Switzerland. The BuildCoin Foundation believes everyone deserves access to affordable and reliable infrastructure to reach their highest potential and to live their best life. Our BuildCoin Ecosystem modernizes infrastructure project origination and development by methodically executing business and technological processes. As a blockchain platform, BuildCoin, offers transparency and immutability, process integrity and disintermediation, lower costs and faster transactions, and access to high-quality data to participants. Visit buildcoinfoundation.org .
View original content with multimedia: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/buildcoin-foundation-appoints-management-council-members-300610377.html
SOURCE BuildCoin Foundation
